name: Malicious Script Execution Mitigation Playbook
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker used a command-line interface to execute malicious scripts, leading to unauthorized changes and data exfiltration.

action--c1f91d4b-2b65-4e2b-b8b6-f0bfca1b.name: Kill malicious process
action--c1f91d4b-2b65-4e2b-b8b6-f0bfca1b.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious script.

action--f4c25c7f-0b42-4eaa-b57c-e24f4d34.name: Isolate affected host
action--f4c25c7f-0b42-4eaa-b57c-e24f4d34.description: Take the affected host offline to prevent further damage.

action--e340d752-8f7f-4a05-bc5b-002996e4.name: Scan network
action--e340d752-8f7f-4a05-bc5b-002996e4.description: Perform a network scan to detect any other affected devices.

parallel--5c818665-5fb6-43b5-bb99-bb731e.name: Mitigate Affected Hosts
parallel--5c818665-5fb6-43b5-bb99-bb731e.description: Simultaneously perform isolation and scanning for the network.
